result.markdown: --- title: "Week 4: The forecaster's toolbox" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Four benchmark forecasting methods that we will use for comparison * Fitted values, residuals * Forecasting with transformations ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## In-class activities Complete Exercises 1-5, 9-10 from [Section 3.7 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/decomposition-exercises.html). ## Assignments * [Assignment 2](assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Friday 22 March. * [Assignment 3](assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Friday 12 April.
